attributes.additional_details: Parking has always been a nightmare in Luton specially It's Lockdown.
attributes.background: The government should stop Traffic wardens giving tickets as It's Lockdown and there are not enough spaces for people to park in parking bays. Due to the announcement by Boris Johnson on Monday 4th January many people will get PCN & this needs to stop. Luton Borough Council

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/567370
